      • SavePixs

        public final boolean SavePixs(java.lang.String path)
        save pixels data to file. saved as RGBA_8888 format.
        Parameters:
        path - path-name to the file.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • RestorePixs

        public final boolean RestorePixs(java.lang.String path)
        restore pixels data from file. must be RGBA_8888 format.
        Parameters:
        path - path-name to the file
        Returns:
        true or false. pixels format of pixels must match to DIB object, otherwise return false.
